content.query:
USE globantdb
GO
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'jobs/jobs.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'globantacc',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = FALSE,
        FIRSTROW = 1,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        id INT,
        job VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]
